ns:common.topic.description: MillScript is a computer programming language for the batch production of templated Web sites. The language is a Java-based, early implementation of Spice, an experimental language developed by the OpenSpice group.
rdfs:label: MillScript

ns:common.document.text: MillScript is a computer programming language for the batch production of templated Web sites. The language is a Java-based, early implementation of Spice, an experimental language developed by the OpenSpice group.

ns:type.object.name: MillScript
